author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Outlander has Scotland at its heartTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Outlander has Scotland at its heart Published on : Friday, August 7, 2015
“The Outlander TV series has captured the imagination of audiences across the world and we are thrilled that fans will now be able to have a little piece of Claire, Jamie and indeed Scotland in their homes with the release of these exciting DVD and Blu-ray collections in the UK.
“Scotland is the land that inspired Outlander and we know that many people have not only visited Scotland after falling in love with the series or book, but some fans have even moved here.
“We have already seen a huge buzz globally around Outlander and the starring role our beautiful country plays in the show. The series and indeed the extra features on these DVD and Blu-ray collections have Scotland at their heart, and I’m sure even more viewers will be inspired to become visitors as a result.”
Based on the bestselling novels by Diana Gabaldon, Outlander follows the story of Claire Randall (played by Caitriona Balfe), a married English combat nurse from 1945 who, while on her second honeymoon in Inverness, is mysteriously swept back in time to the 18th-century Scottish Highlands. There she meets Jamie (played by Scottish actor Sam Heughan), a chivalrous young warrior, with whom she becomes romantically entwined.
Source:-Visit Scotland
